strings.Value: [Attack] "You look like regular bandits to me — and I don't waste words on bandits!"
"Looks like I came to the wrong place."
"This is your only warning — let me in, or I'll force my way in."
"I'm just a traveler looking for a safe place to spend the night. Please let me in."
[Bribe the guards with 500 coins] "I really need to get in there. Can we make a deal?"
"Hey, who's that walking over there?" {n}A barbarian standing guard at the cave entrance calls over to you coarsely.{/n} "It's dangerous to walk around here. Better turn back!"
{n}Amiri answers something in Hallit, the native tongue of the {g|Numeria}Numerian{/g} Kellid tribes.{/n}
{n}The guards look to you with their hands on their weapons, waiting for an answer.{/n}

{n}After a brief exchange in Hallit with Amiri, the guard switches back to Common.{/n} "Peace. If you want to speak with our elders or spend the night, you may enter. Just don't expect a free dinner!"
"You again? What do you need?"
{n}The guard scratches his head, confused.{/n} "You? A chieftain? Will wonders never cease!"
{n}A mocking grin appears on the guard's face.{/n}
"Hey, easy now! We have a cave full of fighters, here. You want in — enter. But if you're looking for trouble, it may be closer than you thought."
"Looking to put your strength to the test? That can be arranged!"
"We're fighters from the {g|Tiger Lords}Tiger Lords{/g} tribe. We're just minding our own business here — we're not looking for a fight. So long as you're not looking for trouble, you may enter."
"You, a chieftain? Your elven fingers couldn't hold anything heavier than a spoon! How could you lead warriors?"
"Oh, a chieftain, are you? But you can hardly be seen down there! I could crush you underfoot without even noticing!"
"A traveler? All right, come in — warm yourself by the fire. Just stay out of storage, and don't expect a free meal!"
"A traveler? I don't like the look of you. Go spend the night somewhere else."
{n}After sharing the gold, the guards step aside.{/n} "Don't know what you're after in this hellhole, but when you meet our elders, you'll have to explain it to them yourself."
"I assure you that this is indeed the baron{mf||ess} of {kingdomname}, as well as my l{mf|ord|ady}. Show some respect!"
"All right, all right! A chieftain, huh. Wonders never cease!"
"Oh, a brave one, aren't you? Well, come on, then. Try to give us a hard time! What, are your hands sweaty already? I thought so."
{n}The barbarian turns away, feigning indifference.{/n}
"Alert! We're under attack!"
